products.name: NCCER: The Story
products.description: An overview of NCCER, the credentials they provide, the products we jointly publish, knowing when to sell NCCER, and the tips for how to effectively sell the solution.
products.author: Pearson

questions.text: In 1995, the NCCER was created by:
questions.option1: More than 100 of top contractors and construction organizations
questions.option2: The International Brotherhood of Electrical Workers
questions.option4: The United States Green Building Council
questions.answer1: More than 100 of top contractors and construction organizations

questions.text: Why would a student want to earn NCCER credentials in addition to any certificate or degree they may be earning at their school?
questions.option1: They can earn "customer loyalty" points from Pearson and NCCER
questions.option2: They can get discounts at Home Depot and Lowes for a lifetime
questions.option3: They can help them get a discount on their college tuition
questions.option4: It can help them get a job and better pay
questions.answer1: It can help them get a job and better pay

questions.text: Some of the more popular crafts that you will most likely find on campus include:
questions.option1: Power line worker, HVAC, hydroblasting, and plumbing
questions.option2: welding, HVAC, electrical, carpentry, and plumbing
questions.option3: Boilermaking, HVAC, sprinkler fitting, carpentry, and plumbing
questions.option4: Pipelayer, HVAC, electrical, carpentry, and scaffolding
questions.answer1: welding, HVAC, electrical, carpentry, and plumbing

questions.text: In the recording we identified a 3-step process for engaging a department chair regarding the NCCER solution. This process included:
questions.option1: Ask the qualifying questions. Direct them to PHE.com for details. Show the NCCER promo video
questions.option2: Give them a copy of the catalog. Direct them to the Instructor Resource Center. Show the NCCER promo video
questions.option3: Ask the qualifying questions. Show the NCCER promo video. Contact your Pearson Executive Director NCCER specialist for assistance
questions.option4: Show the NCCER promo video. Tell them about the accreditation process. Take them out for lunch
questions.answer1: Ask the qualifying questions. Show the NCCER promo video. Contact your Pearson Executive Director NCCER specialist for assistance
questions.answerDetails: The accuracy and detail of this book, combined with the graphic nature and number of photographs used in the case study approach, make it an attractive choice compared other books on this topic.
